metadata.synopsis: A warning message about the guarded ship in docks (that contains tadpoles). Steel watchers are guarding this place and they will attack if characters will get close to the ship
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. goto -218; 4; -1373. Click on the board

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *This dock is closed until further notice by order of Lord Gortash.*
